## Plane.copyFromPoints() method

Updates the current Plane from the plane defined by the three given points.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
copyFromPoints(point1: Vector3, point2: Vector3, point3: Vector3): Plane;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  point1 | <code>Vector3</code> | one of the points used to contruct the plane |
|  point2 | <code>Vector3</code> | one of the points used to contruct the plane |
|  point3 | <code>Vector3</code> | one of the points used to contruct the plane |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Plane`

the updated Plane.
